div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Apr. 29, 1889. [ARRIVAL OF SURVIVORS OF THE WRECK OF THE "S. S. DENMARK"]

body.p: Approximately one hundred and fifty of the passengers that were rescued from the wrecked steamship "Denmark" arrived in Chicago today.
Many of them will go to work at various trades and professions in this city, while others will take jobs in the factories in Aurora, Illinois.
